name: ACAccountCredential
desc: An ACAccountCredential object encapsulates the information needed to authenticate a user.

items.name: init!(oAuthToken: String!, tokenSecret: String!)
items.desc: Initializes an account credential using OAuth.

items.name: init!(oAuth2Token: String!, refreshToken: String!, expiryDate: Date!)
items.desc: Initializes an account credential using OAuth 2.

items.name: var oauthToken: String!
items.desc: The token used for the credential.
